p:
Based on the typical methods as reported in the literature
10 , α-ZrP was prepared by hydrothermal process in the sealed Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave (30 mL). Typical reaction conditions are as follows: ZrOCl 2·8H 2O (4.5 g, 13.68 mmol), H 3PO 4 (3.2 g, 27.69 mmol), NaF (58.8 mg, 1.37 mmol) and H 2O (5 mL, 277.78 mmol); 180 °C; 36 h.
